name: Beast Fighter: Survival of the Fit {BETA 1.0}
name_original: Beast Fighter: Survival of the Fit {BETA 1.0}
description:
Beast Fighter: Survival of the Fit {BETA 1.0} is an action-fighting game developed by That Dev Dude. It came out on 11-01-2020.
Beast Fighter: Survival of the Fit {BETA 1.0} is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
